column4: can anyone help me out? i cant access the web, so this is the only place i have to turn to ;P
have you done anything on your personal machine that would affect the web?
yes i was messing with iptables ;x, however ive removed it at this point
when you do sudo iptables -L, does it look reasonable
ive removed iptables at this point
I don't think removing iptables was your solution
i just was trying to get to google to fix the rest ;D
the package contains administration tools for the packet filter, but as far as I know, not the filter itself (which is part of the kernel)
have you reinstalled iptables? if so, get a list
